name: TodayKanji
0:
”Alexa open today kanji.”
”Alexa ask today kanji start”
”start training”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: today kanji
des:
The skill tells you a Japanese Kanji.
You can here the Kanji's meaning in English and Japanese pronunciation.
If you want to learn the pronunciations, you can practice three time per day.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
